DataElement.preferredName: Material Research Resource Negation Active Comment ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Physical supplies provided by an individual company, institution, or organization for the conduct of research. EXAMPLE(S): In kind contributions, donations of study drug, device. Additional description why the resource is no longer active.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Material Research Resource Negation Active Comment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.:The funding, research facilities, and materials available for research_An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Exerting influence or producing an effect; taking part in an activity.:A written explanation, observation or criticism added to textual material.
